hints.content:
First, we need to find $96$ cm on the number line.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/c32e00c41fc65f61853d76524e099c46df599f0d)

Each dot represents one alien arm. 

So, we need to count all of the dots on the line plot that represent lengths longer than $96$ cm.  

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/56dabb3c29bb6a6a7f29afbc3ad85a876246fa7d)

There are $\blueE6$ dots that represent lengths longer than $96$ cm.   

$\blueE6$ alien arms are longer than $96$ cm.

question.content:
The lengths of alien arms are shown below.  

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f90dba5cdbc1129d25f2c61ecba4cb0ea3d59c63)

**How many alien arms are longer than $96$ centimeters?**  

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] alien arms
